title.narrative: Ampliación del Tramo de Cuatro Carriles de la Carretera East Bank Demerara
East Bank Demerara Four Lane Extension

description.narrative: El objetivo principal del proyecto es mejorar la movilidad y la seguridad urbanas ysuburbanas, reduciendo los costos de transporte y las tasas de accidente mediante la ampliación de la carretera principal de East Bank Demerara al sur de Providence, de dos a cuatro carriles.

The main objective is to enhance urban and suburban mobility and safety, through lowered transport costs and reduced accident rates by expanding the East Bank Demerara Main Road south of Providence from two lanes to four lanes.

activity-description.narrative: A firm was hired to provide supervision consulting services for the expansion and rehabilitation of the East Bank of Demerara roadway from Providence to Grove. The expansion project would enhance urban and suburban mobility and safety through lowered transport costs and reduced accident rates.

The roadway on the East Bank of Demerara between Providence and Grove is being expanded and rehabilitated from two lanes to four lanes to enhance urban and suburban mobility abd safety through lowered transport costs and reduced accident rates.
